sides.title: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout
sides.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform [Torpedo] and [Missile] attacks against targets you have locked. If you do, you cannot spend you lock during the attack. Add [Torpedo] and [Missile] slots.

sides.title: Pivot Wing (Closed)
sides.ability: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die. After you execute a [0 [Stationary]] maneuver, you may rotate your ship 90˚ or 180˚. Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Pivot Wing (Open)
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Servomotor S-foils (Closed)
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, roll 1 fewer attack die. Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Servomotor S-foils (Open)

sides.title: Xg-1 Assault Configuration
sides.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, uou can still perform [Cannon] attacks. While you perform a [Cannon] attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 3 attack dice. Add [Cannon] slot.
